revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Americanized spelling of {{der|en|de|Jerger}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yergers}} # {{surname|en|from=German}}. ===Statistics=== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yerger'' is the 17300<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 1636 individuals. ''Yerger'' is most common among White (90.46%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=eegrry|greyer}}
